name: Honest Ninja!
description:
ATTENTION GAME JAMMERS! 

I messed up a little, its too tidious downloading all the files, I know. I just realised after the jam ended the upload period. So i created a WebGL version on my dashboard! if you really want to play it, go to my dashboard and look for HonestNinja WebGL!

https://xxdima-bossxx.itch.io/honestninja-w

I know this Game jam doesn't work like this, but this is my first project and I am happy that I finished it!
